subject: Affiliate
description_text: Dear simsonn Marketing Team, I am one of your affiliate partners. I currently have a commission of $16  is now due for payment. I would like to kindly ask when the payment will be processed. Looking forward to your response. Thank you very much in advance!

conversations.body_text: Hi fungus snow,     We apologize. If the commission threshold has not been met, we will pay it out once it is reached.

Hello. Have a nice day. Thank you for your feedback. I am currently busy
with personal matters, so I can no longer continue marketing products for
partners. I hope you can help me with the payment. Thank you and best
regards.

Vào Th 5, 20 thg 11, 2025 vào lúc 15:54 support@simsonn.com <
support@simsonn.com> đã viết:

>

Hello, I look forward to hearing from you. Thanks and best regards.
